channel.title: Music on Hi, I'm Phi.
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Hi, I'm Phi.

item.title: March 2020
item.description: A lot of new music being released despite COVID-19. Might be the only thing keeping me sane during these crazy times. Car Seat Headrest - Can’t Cool Me Down Dirty Projectors - Overlord Shabazz Palaces - Fast Learner (feat. Purpel Tate Nate) Theophilus London - Whiplash (feat. Tame Impala) Phoebe Bridgers - Garden Song Waxahatchee - Lilacs King Princess, Channel Tres - Hit The Back (Channel Tres Remix) HAIM - The Steps Porches - Patience U.

item.title: February 2020
item.description: The last song on this playlist was shared to me from an Irish friend who has exquisite taste in music. Hi Aoife! Donny Benét - Girl of My Dreams Tame Impala - Lost in Yesterday Caribou - Home Thundercat - Black Qualls (feat. Steve Lacy & Steve Arrington) Real Estate - Paper Cup (feat. Sylvan Esso) Against All Logic - Deeeeeeefers Khruangbin & Leon Bridges - Midnight yllwblly - The Youngest Child Avalon Emerson - One More Fluorescent Rush Postcard Versions - Fence Response

item.title: January 2020
item.description: I’ve been pretty heads down preparing for data science interviews (side note: HIRE ME!), so a more outsized presence from electronic music this month. The last one in particular was a favorite of my old flatmates in Berlin. But of course, a requisite appearance by Phoebe Bridgers. Lewsberg - The Smile Ethan Gruska - Enough for Now (feat. Phoebe Bridgers) Japanese Breakfast - Essentially Sidney Gish - Impostor Syndrome Surf Curse - Disco Ryley Walker - Spoil with the Rest Aquaserge - Tour du monde Mark Giuliana, Kesswa - BUD (Shigeto Mix) DAVID AUGUST - A Golden Rush (feat.

item.title: December 2019
item.description: I’m starting to source music from a broader set of sources (television, film). I recently saw the film “Jojo Rabbit” and fell in love with the music choices. I added a couple songs from the film onto this playlist. These songs are actually German versions of old hits. Additionally, I’m adding old and new tunes together. Previously I tried to stick to new releases, but I found that quest to daunting at times.

item.title: November 2019
item.description: A lot of Phoebe Bridgers in this one, sorry. What can I say, she’s the dream. Matt Berninger, Phoebe Bridgers - Walking on a String HAIM - Now I’m In It Phoebe Bridgers - Georgia Lee Wovoka Gentle - 1,000 Thousand Opera Singers Working In Starbucks Phoebe Bridgers, Fiona Apple - 7 O’Clock News / Silent Night People Club - Who I Call My Baby Hatchie - Her Own Heart Fazerdaze - Shoulders Long Beard - Getting By girl in red - i wanna be your girlfriend
